/ one ambient light
l a .05 .05 .05
 
/ camera: front view pointing towards -Z, 35mmx25mm "film", 20mm focal length
/ making 500x357 pixels
/ front view
c 0 0 0 0.0 0.0 -1.0 20.0 35.0 25.0 500 357
